channel.title: Bonsai on Nortrup in Development
channel.description: Recent content in Bonsai on Nortrup in Development

item.title: Better Product Management through Bonsai
item.description: Two years ago my wife bought me a class to make a bonsai. I made a tiny tree in a small pot. It was generous to call it a Bonsai and most practitioners would look upon it with a sense of “that’s cute”. Since then, I’ve managed to keep that tree alive and now have a collection of trees that I’m slowly turning into Bonsai. Along the way I’ve learned a lot about horticulture and art, and maybe some things that make me a better product manager along the way.

item.title: Star Magnolia Update
item.description: 2021-12-04 I got this tree in November and wanted to do some initial wiring on it and start to pull down the major branches that I wanted to keep. Before well I wrapped but didn’t bend): I broke a few minor branches while trying to put some bend in. Attempted to fix with superglue, we’ll see what happens. Generally happy with bringing secondary branches closer to horizontal and adding some shape to them.

item.title: Star Magnolia Bonsai Log / Plan
item.description: This is a running log for a Star Magnolia that I acquired from a nursery as a Bonsai project.
